Name: Rambell
About the game: ABOUT THE GAME .Rambell is an online and local multiplayer party game for 2-8 players. Beat up your friends in a variety of absurd games and destroy friendships in the unique collection of mini-games. Throw bombs at each other, hide from your friends as a giant donut or kick them off a platform. Fool your friends to win because only victory counts ;) And earn fun cosmetic items by winning. LEVEL-EDITOR Create your own level with an integrated level editor or just create your own minigames. In which you can beat your friends or put it online so that others can have fun with your level or minigame. ONLINE AND LOCAL MULTIPLAYER .Play the way you want. Rambell allows 1 to 8 players to compete both online and locally on the same screen. to compete against each other. Whether online or locally, it's always equally fun to ruin friendships. MINIGAMES From simple nostalgic fun to unique and evolutionary games, Rambell includes a wide range of exciting mini-games. Push your friends into the abyss, dig to be the first to find the treasure, and make sure you're not holding the bomb when it goes off. FEATURES - 2 - 8 Players - 30 Maps - 10 Minigames - Server List - Level-Editor - Custom Character design
